title: AdiIRC v1.9.6
description:
AdiIRC (AKA All Day I IRC) is a free IRC (Internet Relay Chat) developed by Per Amundsen, if you know mIRC, HexChat, XChat then you know what this is about.

In short, AdiIRC is lightweight, fully portable (despite the fact that it has an Installer, AdiIRC stores all of its configurations within the installed folder, no registry keys are created and it creates only one folder, so whenever you have the need to back it up, just copy the installed folder, and you're good to go, you can run it from a USB Stick if you want to

With an awesome support for MSL (mIRC Scripting Language) if you like to play with it and you're tired of mIRC this is the best you'll get (and you wont regret it).

Currently at version 1.9.6, this client is constantly being developed and updated, bugs fixed and new features added,
the MSL support keeps growing and growing, and now the technical stuff.

Customization: 
Themes, MTS Themes (mIRC themes, some may not work, but most of them do)
Plugins
Scripts/Snippets (some might work, others may not)
Translations (currently there are translation for the following languages Danish/da-DK, Polish/pl-PL, Chinese/zh-CN
Italian/it-IT, Spanish/es-ES, French/fr-FR, German/de-DE, Portuguese/pt-PT, Portuguese/pt-BR, Russian/ru-RU)
Just as a warning, the client might not be fully translated into the presented languages, translations are made by
volunteers, plus, certain strings are nearly impossible to translate, hope you udnerstand

Now Playing: FYI the Now Playing allows you to show others what you are currently playing on your media player, the following Media Players are the ones supported
...Winamp
...Itunes
...MusikCube
...QCDPlayer
...MediaMonkey
...Foobar2000
...XMPlayer
...Spotify
...VLC Media Player
...Media Player Classic
...PotPlayer
...SMPlayer
...MusicBee
...And more..

Misc:
...Threaded Multiservers
...System Informations
...DCC Chat/File Transfers
...Fullscreen
...Opacity and Transparency
...Background Images
...Full Message Logging
...Easy Message Search
...SSL Connections
...IPV6 Connections
...IRC logs browser/viewer
...mIRC scripting
...Dock/Undockable panels
...Spell Checker
...Nick Column
...A lot more...

AdiIRC requires Net Framework 2.0 or higher to be installed, if you don't have it, just install the one provided in this torrent.
Or you can download it at Microsoft website, or at AdiIRC web site (www.adiirc.com)

Last but not least, AdiIRC runs on Linux under Wine 1.5+, Net Framework is also required install it through WineTricks http://winetricks.org/winetricks

Official Website: http://www.adiirc.com
AdiIRC Screenshots: http://dev.adiirc.com/boards/6/topics/195?r=207
Translations: http://www.adiirc.com/translations/
Themes: http://www.adiirc.com/themes/
